title: kAmadhEnukA divya
sahitya:
kAmadhEnukA divya nAmAmruta pAnan aruLum


anupallavi

  sAma vEda sAramAna tatvamasi mantirattil Urum 
sOma sUrya rasattait-tandu shOka mOha dAgam pongum


caraNam    punitamAna pullil mEindu pUnguzhalum yAzundOindu
manidar dEvarAga jnAna maDi shurakkumpaDi aruL shei
